title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Instructional Design for Eastern Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical background and cultural significance of East Asian traditional music using three or more case-based examples.
Learners can practice and implement (with over 80% accuracy) the scale systems and performance techniques of traditional Korean, Chinese, and Japanese instruments.
Learners can collaborate with peers via digital platforms (e.g., Padlet) to write analytical reports (over 500 characters) on East Asian music.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
